Monster ID7395

The Monstrous basilisk is a superior variant of the Basilisk. It has a chance of spawning after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Similar to their lower-level counterparts, a mirror shield or V's shield is required to safely engage them, as otherwise the player will take rapid damage and have their stats drained.

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 48,470 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Monstrous basilisk kill is worth 46,951.37.

The average Monstrous basilisk kill while on a Konar task is worth 48,502.48.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 February 2017
(update | poll)

The monstrous basilisk was given a graphical update to be more distinguishable from their regular variant.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The monster's examine text is a reference to the Harry Potter series, in which phoenix tears are one of the only cures for a basilisk's powerful venom. However, basilisks in RuneScape aren't poisonous.
